Portfolio.Title: Cultcure Close Up - HTML Version
Portfolio.description: What we do in English Language Teaching (ELT) at Pearson, because we get to work in lots of different types of classrooms around the world. Every day we look at ways of combining content, assessment, technology and services to help all teachers and students across the world teach, learn and practise their English skills. Making us, Pearson, the world’s leading education company.

Portfolio.Title: E-Texts
Portfolio.description: Your English course in eText format gives you a great learning experience online or on a tablet. eText brings the Students' Book, Workbook or Activity Book to life on your preferred device, with integrated media.

Portfolio.Title: Salmo
Portfolio.description: The leading fish and tackle retailer in baltic states

Portfolio.Title: IATEFL
Portfolio.description: At IATEFL 2016, our ELT experts spoke about improving learner outcomes and boosting confidence with exciting new courses.

Portfolio.Title: Live Beat
Portfolio.description: Live Beat is a new four-level course that keeps teenage students motivated and focused to achieve better learning outcomes. It builds on the successful approach used by the same authors in the bestselling Upbeat course.

Portfolio.Title: Cultcure Close Up - TeamSite Version
Portfolio.description: What we do in English Language Teaching (ELT) at Pearson, because we get to work in lots of different types of classrooms around the world. Every day we look at ways of combining content, assessment, technology and services to help all teachers and students across the world teach, learn and practise their English skills. Portfolio.Title: My English Lab
Portfolio.description: MyEnglishLab delivers your Pearson course content online, with the added benefits of automated marking and extra support for students.

Portfolio.Title: Massive Motivation
Portfolio.description: We need to motivate our employees, channel partners and customers to get the behaviour and performance we want. But people have changed. So the way that we motivate them has to change too.

Portfolio.Title: Move IT!
Portfolio.description: Move It! is a four-level American English course with a complete print and digital learning package. Multiple options for dynamic, personalized classes motivate today’s 21st century teenagers, whatever their learning styles.

Portfolio.Title: Motivate to Succeed
Portfolio.description: Motivated to succeed.A huge range of employee benefits, incentives & rewards and compliance solutions.

Portfolio.Title: Our Discovery Island
Portfolio.description: Your English course in eText format gives you a great learning experience online or on a tablet. eText brings the Students' Book, Workbook or Activity Book to life on your preferred device, with integrated media.

Portfolio.Title: Motivate to Succeed
Portfolio.description: Motivated to succeed.A huge range of employee benefits, incentives & rewards and compliance solutions.

Portfolio.Title: Pearson English
Portfolio.description: Here at Pearson English Language Teaching (ELT), we develop courses, qualifications and learning tools to make teaching English easier. From Primary English to Business courses and everything in between, our materials give you all that you need to succeed.

Portfolio.Title: Penguin Readers primary
Portfolio.description: Join us and enjoy loads of materials to boost your classes - activity sheets, posters, story cards, games, articles on current trends, online presentations and much more!

Portfolio.Title: Pearson Progress program
Portfolio.description: The first ever online, fully automated and institutionally administered progress test. Progress accurately measures student progress in English, highlighting strengths and weaknesses to inform teaching.

Portfolio.Title: CS Redemption Platform
Portfolio.description: Reward redemtion system for retailers such as Argos, Boots, Halfords, PC world and much more.

Portfolio.Title: Speakout first edition
Portfolio.description: The award-winning course that invites you and your students to discover English as it is really spoken. Speakout builds up all the skills and knowledge students need to express themselves confidently in a real English-speaking environment.

Portfolio.Title: Speakout second edition
Portfolio.description: The award-winning course that invites you and your students to discover English as it is really spoken. Speakout builds up all the skills and knowledge students need to express themselves confidently in a real English-speaking environment.

Portfolio.Title: Speakout Extra
Portfolio.description: Speakout Extra provides a bank of additional resources that includes grammar, listening and speaking, pronunciation, reading and vocabulary practice as well as video worksheets to use in class.

Portfolio.Title: TopNotch
Portfolio.description: Top Notch and Summit form the award-winning six-level English course trusted by millions of learners around the world. Use Top Notch for your A1 to B1+ level students and continue their learning with Summit, for B2 to C1 students.
